name: Protecting Against Manipulation
description: Developing effective defenses against narcissistic tactics before they take root.

cards.title: Establishing Strong Personal Boundaries
cards.description: Preventing narcissists from exploiting kindness and empathy.
bulletpoints: Clearly define personal boundaries and enforce them consistently.
Avoid justifying or over-explaining boundaries to manipulators.
Recognize when someone is testing your limits for future exploitation.

cards.title: Resisting Emotional Baiting
cards.description: Neutralizing tactics designed to provoke emotional reactions.
bulletpoints: Narcissists use baiting to extract emotional responses for control.
Practice non-reactivity and disengagement in high-stress interactions.
Redirect conversations and avoid feeding into manipulative cycles.

cards.title: Psychological Self-Defense Mechanisms
cards.description: Strengthening mental resilience to prevent narcissistic influence.
bulletpoints: Maintain strong self-awareness to detect subtle manipulation.
Use cognitive distancing to avoid internalizing false narratives.
Reinforce self-trust and avoid seeking validation from manipulators.
